department: Office of Secretary to the Governor General
short_summary: Enhancing the www.gg.ca website to improve user experience
description: The Communications and Public Affairs section within the Office of the Secretary to the Governor General (OSGG) requires resources related to web design services for the enhancement of the www.gg.ca website, in order to improve the user experience.
duration_in_months: They must provide services for approximately 6 months.
full_summary:
#### Tender for Web Services

**Title:** SPICT - Volet 1: A.9 System Auditor, A.10 Test Coordinator, A.13 Web Designer, and A.14 Web Developer

**Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01005430
**Solicitation Number:** 20212015

The Office of the Secretary to the Governor General (OSGG) invites bids for the provision of web services to enhance the user experience on the www.gg.ca website. The contract is a single bid request that includes the following technical specialists:

- A.9 System Auditor
- A.10 Test Coordinator
- A.13 Web Designer
- A.14 Web Developer

**Contract Overview:**
The contract will commence upon award and is expected to run for approximately 6 months. The bidder must submit a comprehensive proposal for all resource categories requested.

**Terms and Conditions:**
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-22T14:00:00
- **Publications Date:** 2022-08-26
- **Contracting Entity:** Governor General
- **Address:** Rideau Hall 1 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0A1 Canada
- **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Patry, Stephanie
Email: [OSGGContracts@gg.ca](mailto:OSGGContracts@gg.ca)

**Document Attachments:**
- [20212015 - npp_en.docx.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/c2f89d9b65851a31a41ba4674ed9ff7f/20212015_-_npp_en.docx_.pdf)
- [20212015 - npp_fr.docx.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/abe7ea985fd1735bb7ab6ac098cf8270/20212015_-_npp_fr.docx_.pdf)
